text: Jean-Pierre Defontaine (4 February 1937 – 1 January 2022) was a French politician. He was a member of the Radical Party of the Left. He was a member of the National Assembly from 1978 to 2007. He was President of the club RC Lens from 1976 to 1979. He was born in Mametz, France. He was Mayor of Hénin- sur-Cojeul between 1983 until 1996. Defontaine died in Hénin-sur-Cojeul on 1 January 2022, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors
